description: This is a Python source file defining asynchronous Celery tasks related to network device management operations such as SNMP, WebPA, TR069, and USP data fetching. It includes class definitions for stub protocol clients, functions for updating job status in a database, and task functions decorated for Celery queue processing.

classes.name: SNMPClient
classes.description: Stub class for SNMP protocol client, with asynchronous get method.

classes.name: WebPAClient
classes.description: Stub class for WebPA protocol client, with asynchronous get method.

classes.name: TR069Client
classes.description: Stub class for TR069 protocol client, with asynchronous get method.

classes.name: USPClient
classes.description: Stub class for USP protocol client, with asynchronous get method.

methods.name: None _update_job_status( session: AsyncSession, job_id: str, status: str, details: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None )
methods.description: Updates the status of a job in the database, optionally storing result details.

methods.name: str snmp_get(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, device_ip: str, oid: str, cred: Dict[str, Any])
str tr069_get(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, endpoint: Dict[str, Any], parameter: str)
str usp_get(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, endpoint: Dict[str, Any], path: str)
str webpa_get(self: RLSTask, job_id: str, endpoint: Dict[str, Any], path: str)
